outputs.output_descr: This project, upon completion, will result in a phase-out of 183.7 metric tonnes (2009 data) of HCFC-141b consumption by converting to cyclopentane technology in manufacture of insulation foam for domestic refrigerators at Walton Hi-Tech Industries Limited and significantly contribute towards Bangladesh's compliance with 2013 and 2015 control targets.

project_descr: Conversion from HCFC-141b to cyclopentane technology in the manufacture of insulation foam in domestic refrigerators at Walton Hi-Tech Industries Ltd, Bangladesh
project_title: Conversion frm HCFC141b 2 Cyclopentane technology Walton
